roleset.name: remove salt from

role.descr: cause of loss of salt, agent

example.name: desalinate-v: simple transitive
example.text: ...The uses of atomic energy have contributed to all areas of life and have positively affected economic and social growth in different countries of the world, wheter in *PRO* combating serious diseases, improving the quality of industrial and agricultural production, producing electricity, or desalinating water.

example.name: desalination-n
example.text: A minimum energy consumption for sea water desalination of around 1 kWh/m3 has been determined, excluding prefiltering and intake/outfall pumping.

roleset.note: DESALINATE-V NOTES: Created by Claire (from desalinate.01-v)
